price: Es imposible que [los habitantes de] una ciudad que haya destruido fueran a arrepentirse [ni podrán volver a este mundo].
arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waḥarāmun ʿalā qaryatin ahlaknāhā annahum lā yarjiʿūna
